amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part A of House Report 118-108 to delay implementation of the legislation by 1 year and require a study be conducted in that time by the GAO on the effects of implementation.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to delay implementation of the legislation by 1 year and require a study be conducted in that time by the GAO on the effects of implementation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Green, Al (TX) amendment (A010) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 225 (Roll no. 259).

action.text: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Green, Al (TX).
